description: Session persistence, plan management, and caching

auto_save.notes: Saves state+metrics on step/task/phase/component completion and user pause. StorageException caught silently.

plan_manager.notes: Plans at .lopen/modules/{module}/plan.md. Regex-based checkbox parsing/updating. Atomic writes. Hierarchical task levels.

section_cache.notes: Dual-layer (memory+disk) at .lopen/cache/sections/. Keyed by file path + header. Invalidated on file mtime change. Corrupted entries silently removed.

assessment_cache.notes: Scope-based invalidation. Tracks per-file timestamps. Any file change in scope invalidates. Corrupted entries silently removed.
